import classNames from "classnames"; import * as client from 'filestack-js' import { useState } from "react"; import avatar from 'static/images/avatar/profile-avatar.png' const filestack = client.Filestack(process.env.REACT_APP_FILESTACK_APP_KEY, {}) export const Profile = ({ active }) => { const [ progress, setProgress ] = useState(0) const [upLoading, setUpLoading ] = useState(false) const [ error, setError ] = useState(null) const [ status, setStatus ] = useState('Progress') const onUpload = async (files, onProgress) => { setError(null) setStatus('Progress') setUpoading(true) filestack.upload(files, { onProgress }) .then(results => { setCourseUpdate({ ...courseUpdate, cover_image: results.url }) }).catch(err => { setStatus('Failed') console.log(err) setError(err.status) }) } return (
Your image should be at minimum 200x200 pixels and maximum 6000x6000 pixels.
); }; export default Profile
